imagingbook.pub.corners

Class AbstractGradientCornerDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.corners.AbstractGradientCornerDetector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PointFeatureDetector
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HarrisCornerDetector, ShiTomasiDetector

    public abstract class AbstractGradientCornerDetector
extends Object
implements PointFeatureDetector
    Abstract super class for all corner detectors based on local structure tensor.
    Version:
    2020/02/25

      • computeScore

        public abstract float computeScore(float A,
                                   float B,
                                   float C)
        Calculates the corner response score for a single image position (u,v) from the elements A, B, C of the local structure matrix. To be implemented by concrete sub-classes.
        Parameters:
        A - = Ixx(u,v)
        B - = Iyy(u,v)
        C - = Iyy(u,v)
        Returns:
        the corner score

      • getQ

        the score function
